UserCode.UserInterfaces
Interface IInputPublisher

All Known Implementing Classes:
MouseHandler
public interface IInputPublisher

IInputPublisher: publishes input events to all listeners.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Marc Price

Method Summary
abstract  void Initialise(IInput inputCapture)
          METHOD: initialise the handler by giving it a reference to the input capture source.
abstract  void subscribe(IInputListener l)
          METHOD: Subscribe a new listener for input events.
abstract  void unsubscribe(IInputListener l)
          METHOD: unsubscribe a listener.
 

Method Detail

Initialise

void Initialise(IInput inputCapture)
METHOD: initialise the handler by giving it a reference to the input capture source.

Parameters:
inputCapture - the input capture source (normally via Env3D)

subscribe

void subscribe(IInputListener l)
METHOD: Subscribe a new listener for input events.

Parameters:
l - a reference to the listener that is being subscribed

unsubscribe

void unsubscribe(IInputListener l)
METHOD: unsubscribe a listener.

Parameters:
l - a reference to the listener that is being unsubscribed
